Text:
Is this edition the one they're talking about here?

http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/heat-vision/citizen-kane-coming-blu-ray-197150
I didn't know there was different versions of citizen kane...

Then I guess this one is NOT the 70th anniversary edition that has been meticulously cleaned by experts with an impressive sense for detail.

Unless the source actually has the same cover as the one shown here, then you have somehow managed to get a copy of a film which has not yet been released - kudos!

Check it out - release date is in two weeks :)

http://www.amazon.com/Citizen-Anniversary-Ultimate-Collectors-Blu-ray/dp/B0050G3NWG/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&qid=1314774777&sr=8-2
I think its the same transfer.
